video.title: Army Wives
video.synopsis: Four women and one man, each married to a soldier and living on an army base, contend with infidelity, PTSD and their spouses' long deployments.

episodes.synopsis: Roxy impetuously marries Trevor and moves with her two kids to his Army post. There, she meets four other spouses contending with dramas of their own.
episodes.title: A Tribe Is Born

episodes.synopsis: Pamela's secret may be exposed when she learns that the couple who paid her to be a surrogate are out of town and cannot pick up the twins.
episodes.title: After Birth

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy and Michael discover that Amanda has been arrested for advocating peace in a war protest. Denise finds the courage to stand up to Jeremy.
episodes.title: The Art of Separation

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy is at the movies with Emmalin and Amanda when he hears of his dad's downed helicopter. In shock, Denise desperately wants to go to Frank.
episodes.title: One of Our Own

episodes.synopsis: In response to the crisis in the Sherwood household, Joan and Roland's marriage starts to crumble, and Joan considers retiring from the Army.
episodes.title: Independence Day

episodes.synopsis: Frank gets a hero's welcome when he returns home to the post. With newfound compassion, Frank accepts Jeremy's decision to not attend West Point.
episodes.title: Who We Are

episodes.synopsis: After a childhood of broken promises, Roxy has a hard time trusting that Marda, her mother who visits unexpectedly, is sober.
episodes.title: Hail and Farewell

episodes.synopsis: With Jeremy gone, Amanda continues to rebel against her parents. Denise decides to pursue nursing at the post hospital, but she feels out of place.
episodes.title: Only the Lonely

episodes.synopsis: Joan surprises Roland with her determination to put their marriage before her career, and Frank is upset when Denise is delayed at the hospital.
episodes.title: Nobody's Perfect

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy discovers that a friend is returning for a ceremony that's honoring her late husband -- and to testify about his death in Afghanistan.
episodes.title: Dirty Laundry

episodes.synopsis: Frank is being deployed in three days, and Denise urges him to see Jeremy before he leaves. There, Frank confronts his son about hitting Denise.
episodes.title: Truth & Consequences

episodes.synopsis: Roland opens up to the group about his marriage. Claudia Joy takes on new responsibilities on the post. Amanda makes an announcement to her parents.
episodes.title: Rules of Engagement

episodes.synopsis: The post is put on high alert after a terrorist threat, and Michael orders Frank, Trevor and Chase to deploy immediately.
episodes.title: Goodbye Stranger

episodes.synopsis: Following the aftermath of the bombing at the Hump Bar, the wives struggle to put their lives back together. Roxy awaits word about Trevor.
episodes.title: Would You Know My Name

episodes.synopsis: The Army wives deal with the aftermath of an unexpected tragedy. Joan wrestles with her decision to terminate her pregnancy. Roxy takes in Betty.
episodes.title: Strangers in a Strange Land

episodes.synopsis: Pamela and Chase's daughter stars in the church play. Michael teaches his daughter to drive a stick shift. Roxy's son has a crush on Claudia Joy.
episodes.title: The Messenger

episodes.synopsis: Roland is offered a job as a high school counselor. Denise makes a new friend who encourages her to ride a motorcycle she received as a gift.
episodes.title: Leaving the Tribe

episodes.synopsis: Frank, still in Iraq, becomes increasingly worried about Denise's newfound independence, particularly her affinity for her new motorcycle.
episodes.title: The Hero Returns

episodes.synopsis: Betty learns that her cancer is advancing and decides to fulfill her dream of driving across the country in a Ford Mustang.
episodes.title: Thicker than Water

episodes.synopsis: Joan and Roland learn the sex of their baby. Denise's son, Jeremy, returns to Fort Marshall for the first time since Amanda's death.
episodes.title: Uncharted Territory

episodes.synopsis: Roland is suspected of inappropriate behavior with one of his students. Roxy hires a new waitress, Sandi, to work at Betty's Bar and Grill.
episodes.title: Loyalties

episodes.synopsis: Nervous about Frank's return from Iraq, Denise reevaluates her relationship with Getty. Roxy enrolls in Roland's class to get her GED.
episodes.title: Casting Out the Net

episodes.synopsis: Due to pregnancy complications, Joan is restricted to bed. Trevor is crushed when he learns that his injury prevents him from returning to combat.
episodes.title: Duplicity

episodes.synopsis: Marsha Mason stars as Charlotte, Claudia Joy's mother, who makes an unexpected visit to the Holden household.
episodes.title: Mothers & Wives

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy learns the real reason for her mother's visit when her father, Randall, arrives unexpectedly at the Holden household.
episodes.title: Great Expectations

episodes.synopsis: Roxy tells Roland about Trevor's addiction to painkillers. Frank and Denise discuss their relationship. Pamela is still plagued by her stalker.
episodes.title: Safe Havens

episodes.synopsis: When Frank deploys to Iraq, Denise rents a house to reflect on their separation. Michael presents Trevor with the Silver Star for his actions in Iraq.
episodes.title: Payback

episodes.synopsis: Evan Connor's wife arrives on post hoping to get involved in the FRG. Claudia Joy takes Jennifer under her wing, but they quickly butt heads.
episodes.title: Thank You for Letting Me Share

episodes.synopsis: At the hospital, Denise befriends Renee, the wife of a young soldier who has been injured in Iraq. Joan and Roland struggle to find a suitable nanny.
episodes.title: Transitions

episodes.synopsis: Roxy's mother returns with a new man. Joan and Roland reluctantly let Claudia Joy and Michael baby-sit their young daughter for an evening.
episodes.title: All in the Family

episodes.synopsis: Joan and Roland struggle to balance parenthood and their relationship. Denise and Frank continue to explore their separation.
episodes.title: Departures, Arrivals

episodes.synopsis: Pamela questions her decision to marry into the Army, and Frank remains overseas, leaving Denise more time to question her marriage.
episodes.title: Duty Calls

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy and Michael are unable to leave for Brussels because of Emmalin's disappearance. Roxy tries to wrest control of the bar away from Collin.
episodes.title: Best Laid Plans

episodes.synopsis: Denise learns that Frank might have been injured in a mission and anxiously seeks more information. Claudia Joy attempts to keep her family together.
episodes.title: About Face

episodes.synopsis: As Claudia Joy searches for a place to live, Emmalin continues to act out. Trevor makes a bad judgment call during an important Army exercise.
episodes.title: Moving Out

episodes.synopsis: Michael tries to rebuild his relationship with Emmalin. Pamela and Chase move into a new house, making Trevor insecure about providing for his family.
episodes.title: Incoming

episodes.synopsis: Roxy throws a grand reopening party at the Hump Bar, and Pamela's knowledge of football catches the attention of her son's coach.
episodes.title: Disengagement

episodes.synopsis: Joan and Roland prepare for Sarah Elizabeth's christening. Terrance and Roland help an Iraqi orphan. Lucky the dog finds his way to Fort Marshall.
episodes.title: Family Readiness

episodes.synopsis: Pamela questions the practices her son's football coach uses to teach the boys sportsmanship. Denise and Frank seek relationship advice from a pastor.
episodes.title: Onward Christian Soldier

episodes.synopsis: Joan and Evan compete against each other in Fort Marshall's annual war games exercise. Haneen needs further treatment back in Iraq.
episodes.title: Post and Prejudice

episodes.synopsis: Roxy learns that Finn is struggling in class and has him tested for a learning disability. Claudia Joy accompanies Haneen back to the Middle East.
episodes.title: Coming Home

episodes.synopsis: Pamela loses her wallet, forcing her to spend the day retracing her steps. A famous country music singer comes to Roxy's bar looking for work.
episodes.title: M.I.A.

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy and Denise serve as companions for the widow of a former senator who is visiting the post for a ground-breaking ceremony.
episodes.title: Operation: Tango

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy and Denise get into a car accident on their way to a spa, and tests from the accident lead to a shocking diagnosis for Claudia Joy.
episodes.title: First Response

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy tells Michael and Emmalin that she doesn't want her friends to find out about her condition. Trevor begins work as an Army recruiter.
episodes.title: Duty to Inform

episodes.synopsis: Pamela finally gets the answers she's been seeking about Chase. Denise begins EMT training in an attempt to find a new career in the medical field.
episodes.title: Need to Know Basis

episodes.synopsis: When Roxy and Pamela meet two older Army wives in a nursing home, they get a glimpse into Fort Marshall during World War II.
episodes.title: As Time Goes By

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy returns home, consumed with guilt over the bombing in Iraq. Joan says an emotional good-bye to Roland and Sarah Elizabeth.
episodes.title: Shrapnel and Alibis

episodes.synopsis: Viola surprises everyone with her singing ability, and Michael gets anxious when he learns that a four-star general will be visiting Fort Marshall.
episodes.title: Fire in the Hole

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Claudia Joy prepare for Michael's promotion ceremony. Roland struggles with his workload and parenting duties since Joan's deployment.
episodes.title: Fields of Fire

episodes.synopsis: Denise and Frank face the aftermath of the gunshot that was fired in their home. Trevor and Roxy celebrate the impending arrival of their new baby.
episodes.title: Collateral Damage

episodes.synopsis: Joan's healing takes longer than anticipated. Roxy is stressed about the financial burden that a new baby will have on the family.
episodes.title: Scars and Stripes

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy hosts a breakfast for the Army Spouse of the Year Award finalists. Roxy and Trevor tell T.J. and Finn about the new baby.
episodes.title: Counterattack

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy runs into an old friend. Roland wants to make Sara Elizabeth's first birthday party perfect for Joan, who will be watching via video chat.
episodes.title: Be All You Can Be

episodes.synopsis: Across the post, families make preparations to celebrate Mother's Day with their spouses, and Claudia Joy hosts her annual Mother's Day brunch.
episodes.title: Guns & Roses

episodes.synopsis: Fort Marshall is buzzing with anticipation over the upcoming USO concert, and Pamela throws herself into helping Claudia Joy organize the event.
episodes.title: Evasive Maneuvers

episodes.synopsis: Chase tries to reprioritize his life with Pamela and the kids. Claudia Joy has an interview with the dean of admissions at Carolina Law School.
episodes.title: Heavy Losses

episodes.synopsis: Joan gets exciting news about her return home. At an important game, Emmalin injures her leg, which could end her dreams of playing collegiate hockey.
episodes.title: Over and Out

episodes.synopsis: Roland plans a day trip to Savannah, and Frank offers to baby-sit. Pamela's financial troubles come to a head when she needs a root canal.
episodes.title: New Orders

episodes.synopsis: A public advocacy lawyer tries a case against the Army that ends up pitting Claudia Joy and Michael against each other in a courtroom.
episodes.title: Trial & Error

episodes.synopsis: The post is on high alert as Fort Marshall is on its 99th day without a fatality. Joan goes to the doctor and learns what's causing her symptoms.
episodes.title: Safety First

episodes.synopsis: Pamela has doubts about Chase's new female neighbor. When Emmalin gets disappointing news about her recovery, Michael steps in to help.
episodes.title: Change of Station

episodes.synopsis: As deployment looms, the families struggle in their own ways. Denise and Frank find out the sex of the baby. Pamela explores the idea of dating again.
episodes.title: Army Strong

episodes.synopsis: The tribe adjusts to a "new normal" around Fort Marshall with most of the soldiers deployed. Roxy witnesses a female solider getting arrested.
episodes.title: AWOL

episodes.synopsis: Emmalin returns to the ice and meets a new friend who helps her make a highlight video. Joan spends her first full day alone with Sarah Elizabeth.
episodes.title: Hearts & Minds

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Jill Biden comes to Fort Marshall and visits with the spouses, discussing the challenges their families face while their loved ones are deployed.
episodes.title: Mud, Sweat & Tears

episodes.synopsis: Pamela stumbles upon a murder in Charleston. But when Atlanta detective Gina Maddox comes to investigate, she discovers things aren't what they seem.
episodes.title: Deadly Force

episodes.synopsis: As Emmalin prepares to graduate from high school, Claudia Joy receives devastating news. During a phone call with Jeremy, Denise goes into labor.
episodes.title: Forward March

episodes.synopsis: Denise has her hands full with her newborn. Claudia Joy prepares to send Emmalin to college. Roxy is having problems with her preteen son.
episodes.title: Line of Departure

episodes.synopsis: Pamela makes a decision about her future. Professor Chandler offers Claudia Joy a part-time job as an associate for his firm. Joan is overworked.
episodes.title: Command Presence

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy's first day as a law associate isn't what she expected. Denise, Claudia Joy, Pamela and Roxy plan a wedding shower for Jeremy's fiancée.
episodes.title: Movement to Contact

episodes.synopsis: The tribe leans on each other as they cope with the loss of a loved one.
episodes.title: On Behalf of a Grateful Nation

episodes.synopsis: Emotions are still raw within the tribe, causing each of them to make some drastic decisions about their future.
episodes.title: Soldier On

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy is haunted by the memory of Amanda. Roxy contemplates taking on another business. Roland second-guesses his abilities as a psychiatrist.
episodes.title: Walking Wounded

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy and Chandler try to help an Army wife threatened with deportation. Roxy figures out a way to move forward with building the truck stop.
episodes.title: Strategic Alliances

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy deals with medical issues. Denise and Frank attend a grief support group. Roland and Joan move forward with plans to add to their family.
episodes.title: Supporting Arms

episodes.synopsis: Denise finds the strength to be there for Jeremy's friends. Things are tense between Roxy and Trevor. Roland and Joan want to adopt a baby.
episodes.title: Countermeasures

episodes.synopsis: Roxy and Trevor's marital problems worsen when they start to affect his Army duties. Joan and Roland meet a boy named David and want to adopt him.
episodes.title: Battle Buddies

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy is happy to have Emmalin and Michael back under the same roof. Pamela is worried when Boone is assigned to evaluate her job performance.
episodes.title: Drop Zone

episodes.synopsis: Emmalin's college issues and Michael's unclear career path put a strain on their relationship; Claudia Joy must choose sides. Denise returns to work.
episodes.title: Firefight

episodes.synopsis: Denise tries to help Tanya move on with life after Jeremy. Roxy is finally close to opening the truck stop. Joan still has trouble bonding with David.
episodes.title: Farewell to Arms

episodes.synopsis: Roxy struggles with moving away from her friends; Joan prepares for a hurricane; Denise and Frank celebrate Molly's first birthday.
episodes.title: Winds of War

episodes.synopsis: Joan prepares for a hurricane.
episodes.title: Perchance to Dream

episodes.synopsis: Trevor has a difficult time adjusting to houseguests; Denise's old friend becomes a new face on the base; Pamela struggles with being away from Chase.
episodes.title: The Best of Friends

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy feels threatened by Denise and Jackie's friendship; Roland has a unique opportunity; Roxy adjusts to her duties.
episodes.title: Learning Curve

episodes.synopsis: Roxy has the chance to become more involved; Denise finds herself amidst tension; Gen. Clarke chastises Joan for not combining fast enough.
episodes.title: True Colors

episodes.synopsis: David has a sports accident with a fellow classmate; Trevor and Roxy mediate between a soldier and his wife.
episodes.title: Viral

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy experiences complications related to her diabetes; Frank is involved with a political upheaval in Africa.
episodes.title: System Failure

episodes.synopsis: Tanya and Dr. Hanson try to save a wounded sergeant; Denise and Jackie visit the sergeant's family; Roxy gives encouragement to a withdrawn wife.
episodes.title: Casualties

episodes.synopsis: The group must organize a memorial service; Nicole negotiates a resolution to the conflict in Africa; Frank, Trevor and Hector evacuate the Americans.
episodes.title: Non-Combatants

episodes.synopsis: Denise worries about Frank; Jackie feels overwhelmed; Roxy and Trevor provide financial help to Gloria and Hector; Tanya clashes with a doctor.
episodes.title: After Action Report

episodes.synopsis: Roland meets a man claiming to be David's biological father; Michael investigates; Jackie sinks deeper into her addiction; Frank remains haunted.
episodes.title: Fallout

episodes.synopsis: Roland and Joan discuss legal issues; Denise offers CJ her kidney; Hector wants Gloria to quit working; Roxy has good news.
episodes.title: Blood Relative

episodes.synopsis: Frank questions his resolve; Michael is promoted; Audrey demands payback; David wants to spend time with Marcus; Hector and Gloria fight.
episodes.title: General Complications

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy recovers from surgery; David begins to communicate with Marcus; Trevor worries about Roxy; Hector and Gloria continue to argue.
episodes.title: Fatal Reaction

episodes.synopsis: Trevor's friend comes to Fort Marshall to have surgery; Hector attempts to reconcile with Gloria.
episodes.title: Tough Love

episodes.synopsis: Claudia Joy helps retired veterans with their legal troubles; Roxy worries about Cody; Trevor urges Hector to see a marriage counselor.
episodes.title: Battle Scars

episodes.synopsis: Pamela and Chase invite Roxy and Trevor to join them in Miami; a doctor puts Tanya's future in jeopardy; Jackie's daughter visits.
episodes.title: Hello, Stranger

episodes.synopsis: Trevor and Roxy argue over his Army career; Jackie is frustrated with Sophie's manipulation of her father; Denise considers becoming a nurse.
episodes.title: Baby Steps

episodes.synopsis: Fort Marshall prepares to welcome military dignitaries for its centennial celebration; Hector and Gloria deal with the aftermath of Penny's return.
episodes.title: Centennial

episodes.synopsis: The group deals with the fallout from the events that took place at the Centennial celebration; Roxy and Trevor are able to take Drew home.
episodes.title: The War at Home

episodes.synopsis: Kevin returns home and takes his frustration out on Jackie; Marcus shows up at Piedmont Place High.
episodes.title: Handicap

episodes.synopsis: Roxy and Trevor prepare for a new future; Roland and Joan argue; Kevin takes out his frustration over his condition on Sophie.
episodes.title: Domestic Maneuvers

episodes.synopsis: The group learns that Fort Marshall is merging with an air force base; the troops deploy to Afghanistan; Joan makes a decision about her career.
episodes.title: Onward

episodes.synopsis: The people of Fort Marshall mourn the loss of one of their own.
episodes.title: Ashes to Ashes

episodes.synopsis: The group comes together to say goodbye to a loved one; Roxy and Gloria befriend a young Army wife; Roland has an opportunity to expand his research.
episodes.title: From the Ashes

episodes.synopsis: Denise has her hands full; Latasha, Maggie and Denise come together when their boys get into trouble; Jackie worries about Kevin's return to battle.
episodes.title: Blowback

episodes.synopsis: Joan is disappointed to be pulled from combat; Latasha's son is rushed to the emergency room; Gloria receives her divorce papers.
episodes.title: Hearth and Home

episodes.synopsis: Gloria meets a new man; Jackie's son reveals surprising news; Denise and Frank celebrate their anniversary apart; Holly is unable to talk to Tim.
episodes.title: Disarmament

episodes.synopsis: Denise helps Michael sort through Claudia Joy's clothes; Eddie's impending deployment prompts Caroline to insist on living with her real mother.
episodes.title: Losing Battles

episodes.synopsis: After an awkward conversation with Jackie, Gloria calls things off with Patrick; Denise tries to help ease the tension between Gloria and Jackie.
episodes.title: Brace for Impact

episodes.synopsis: The tribe falls short of their fundraising goals for Claudia Joy's garden until Gloria discovers Holly has a hidden talent that could help them.
episodes.title: Jackpot

episodes.synopsis: The tribe gathers for Claudia Joy's dedication ceremony; Denise gets caught up in a hospital emergency; Michael and Kat bond at a non-work function.
episodes.title: Blood and Treasure

episodes.synopsis: The troops get orders to return to Fort Marshall; Maggie bonds with Caroline; Latasha worries about unexpected expenses; Hector gets some sad news.
episodes.title: Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: The men return from Afghanistan; Holly is excited to reunite with Tim; Quincy's injuries jeopardize his army career; Gloria welcomes Hector home.
episodes.title: Adjustment Period

episodes.synopsis: Latasha worries about Quincy's future in the Army; Gloria agrees to go out on a date with Hector, but is torn when Patrick asks for a second chance.
episodes.title: Damaged

episodes.synopsis: When Tim goes missing, Holly reaches out to the tribe and Tim's platoon for help; Denise catches Michael in a compromising position.
episodes.title: All or Nothing
